website_summaries.verdict: The Kwikset Premis works well and gets user management absolutely right, making it a solid choice for anyone with an interest in Apple HomeKit.
pros: Kwikset's HomeKit-compatible smart lock puts Apple's connected home controls to good use, including Siri voice controls
It also does an outstanding job with user management, letting you create user-specific, time-sensitive entry codes without ever charging you a fee
cons: You can't control the lock from beyond the range of its Bluetooth radio unless you have a third-gen or better Apple TV in your home
The touchscreen is also slightly sluggish

customer_reviews.title: Save your money for another touchscreen system.
customer_reviews.text: Save your money for another touchscreen system. I am extremely unhappy with this purchase. The touchscreen did not work properly during winter months and now it has stopped working completely.... and let's not even talk about the cracked screen. There are only 3 people at home who use this lock and the screen has tons of cracks, I am thinking it is from the sun but regardless of what is causing it, the look is not appealing at all. Please consider another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Birmania

customer_reviews.title: easy upgrade for deadbolts on older doors with smaller 1 1/2" hole
customer_reviews.text: Fast and easy way to add digital locking to a deadbolt in an older door with the smaller hole. I tried 2 other brands but both needed a larger 2 1/8" opening, this mounts fine with the older standard 1 1/2 " hole. Direct replacement of my existing schlage deadbolt. 10 minute install with screwdriver.
customer_reviews.author: S. blarco

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend and phone assistance was very helpful with instruction clarification
customer_reviews.text: This is a front door entry lock. Easy to use combination. Easy installation relatively. Good phone assistance during installation.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Elijah

customer_reviews.title: I am not liking the touch sensitivity on the key ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not liking the touch sensitivity on the key pad. Sometime too sensitive and sometimes no response. If I did it over again I would choose the push button one not the electronic pad.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn B

customer_reviews.title: Includes everything. Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly. Box included everything. If you already have a kwikset deadbolt, you don't even need to replace the inside shaft +can. I turned auto lock off so batteries last pretty long
customer_reviews.author: Shreyas

customer_reviews.title: Not very reliable
customer_reviews.text: Battery runs down quickly. Hard to adjust. Now it’s doing things backwards
customer_reviews.author: rowatdo

customer_reviews.title: Installation was easy. We like not having to carry keys
customer_reviews.text: The lock was well prepared for delivery. Received the lock without any damage. Installation was easy. We like not having to carry keys.
customer_reviews.author: Philip S. Laroya

customer_reviews.title: A Great Find!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second digital lock from Kwikset and both locks are great. No more fumbling for your keys at the front door. I took off 1 star because sometimes the fingerprint smudges are very visible.
customer_reviews.author: Trish Locke

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on our front door.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on our front door and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: J. E. JONES

customer_reviews.title: ... u can have your own code makes it even better to use
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly also knowing u can have your own code makes it even better to use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product; instructions and support lacking
customer_reviews.text: Nice product with the features I wanted; random number before passcode input, auto lock after 30 seconds. However some of the instructions were difficult to assimilate. And although I found some help on the Kwikset website; it is less than user friendly, especially navigation and FAQs. Perhaps some of the Kwikset techies should purchase and install a lock themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Pray4powder

customer_reviews.title: Poor execution for a potentially great lock
customer_reviews.text: I've used Kwikset locks in other homes, but they had physical buttons that always worked. Unfortunately, the model that I liked the best has been discontinued. This model has a touchscreen that is very finicky. The least amount of natural oil on your fingers and it will not work. It has to be cleaned almost every day with a microfiber cloth for it to reliably accept the codes. In addition, the older and less costly models incorporate a slide mechanism for eventual battery changes. This model's rear housing has to be unscrewed for a battery change, and if your door happens to have decorative moulding near the lock, good luck with that!
customer_reviews.author: Ron

product_meta.title: Kwikset 99150-001 SmartCode 915 Touchscreen Electronic UL Deadbolt with Smart Key, Polished Brass
product_meta.description: The SmartCode 915 touchscreen electronic deadbolt is a one-touch locking motorized deadbolt. With your personalized code, you can enter your home with the convenience of keyless entry and the back-lit keypad provides increased visibility. It features patented SecureScreen™ technology to prevent code detection from fingerprints on the touchscreen. SmartCode is easy to install, program and use, and operates on 4 AA batteries. It also features SmartKey Security as the back-up keyway. The Polished Brass finish adds to the traditional look and feel of the product and makes a classic statement.
feature_bullets: Featuring Smart Key re-key technology; re-key the lock yourself in seconds in 3 easy steps
Keypad stays lit for 30 seconds after inactivity
Customized automatic door locking after 30 seconds for peace of mind
Easily installs in minutes with just a screwdriver
Includes 20 minute fire rated round corner latch
Please see Installation Manual and User Manual under Technical Specification section for additional information.
Please see Manual Door Handing video under Related Video Shorts to troubleshoot door jamming and door handing process to align the latch bolt properly to your door and tell if it’s left/right-handed.
